game.title: SPACEBAR CLICKER
game.reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all the game data?

flash_slothmore.name: Flash Slothmore
flash_slothmore.description: World's 'fastest' sloth. Hits spacebar %v times/sec. He's trying his best, okay?

squidward_tentacles.name: Squidward Tentacles
squidward_tentacles.description: Grumpy squid. Hates his job. Hits spacebar %v times/sec with his face... probably.

grumpy_grandma.name: Grumpy Grandma
grumpy_grandma.description: She's not mad at you, just the spacebar. Whacks it %v times/sec with her cane.

woodpecker.name: Woodpecker
woodpecker.description: Mistakes your spacebar for a tasty tree. Pecks it %v times/sec. Nom nom nom.

spacebar_enchantment.name: Spacebar Enchantment
spacebar_enchantment.description: Too lazy to click? This enchantment makes your clicks triple strong! Work smarter.

gatling.name: Gatling Gun
gatling.description: Overkill? Nah. This Gatling gun unleashes %v clicks/sec on that poor spacebar. BRRRRT!

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: Pika-CHOO! This electric mouse zaps your spacebar for %v clicks/sec. Shockingly effective!

blastoise.name: Blastoise
blastoise.description: Blastoise's hydro cannons drench the spacebar with %v clicks/sec. Surf's up, clicks down!

peashooter.name: Peashooter
peashooter.description: This little guy shoots peas at your spacebar for %v clicks/sec. Green and mean!

gatling_pea.name: Gatling Pea
gatling_pea.description: Peashooter's angry cousin. Unleashes a pea-storm of %v clicks/sec. Ratta-tat-PEA!

super_mario.name: Super Mario
super_mario.description: It's-a me, Mario! Stomping your spacebar for %v clicks/sec. Wahoo! Next level clicks!

ultraman_tiga.name: Ultraman Tiga
ultraman_tiga.description: Ultraman Tiga defends your clicks! Zepellion Ray delivers %v spacebar hits/sec. For justice!

revolver.name: Revolver
revolver.description: This town ain't big enough for unclicked spacebars. Revolver hits for %v clicks/sec, partner.

shovel.name: A Shovel?
shovel.description: A shovel? Really? Well, it digs up %v clicks/sec. Don't question its methods, just click!

homer_simpson.name: Homer Simpson
homer_simpson.description: D'oh! Homer's donut quest 'accidentally' lands %v clicks/sec on the spacebar. Mmm, clicks...

poseidon.name: Poseidon
poseidon.description: Summons a tidal wave of %v clicks/sec. Your spacebar is now officially a beach!

mechanical_arm.name: Mechanical Arm
mechanical_arm.description: Double your own clicks speed. Warning: may develop a mind of its own.

default.name: Default Skin
default.description: The classic, reliable spacebar look. Clean and simple.

neon.name: Neon Glow
neon.description: Light up your clicks with a vibrant neon aesthetic.

retro.name: Retro Keys
retro.description: A throwback to the golden age of typewriters and 8-bit.

cyber.name: Cyberpunk Edge
cyber.description: A futuristic design for the digital rebel.

blackboard.name: Chalkboard Classic
blackboard.description: Old school cool. Perfect for some serious clicking lessons!

paper_texture.name: Paper Canvas
paper_texture.description: A fresh, textured start. Let your clicks write the story.

color_blocks.name: Watercolor Splash
color_blocks.description: Artistic vibes! A vibrant splash of colors to inspire clicks.

board.name: Wooden Deck
board.description: Sturdy and rustic. Get on board with this classic look.

cartoon_starry_sky.name: Cartoon Cosmos
cartoon_starry_sky.description: Blast off! A playful, starry adventure awaits your every click.

beach.name: Sandy Shores
beach.description: Sun, sand, and clicks! Your virtual beach getaway awaits.

grassland.name: Green Meadows
grassland.description: Fresh and breezy. Click freely in this open, grassy field.

ocean.name: Blue Sea
ocean.description: Dive in! Explore the vast, click-filled depths of the ocean.

mechanical.name: Mechanical Keys
mechanical.description: Crisp and tactile, like a true mechanical keyboard.

bubble.name: Bubble Pop
bubble.description: A light and fun bubble popping sound for each press.

slap.name: Spacebar Slap
slap.description: Give your spacebar a wake-up call it won't forget!

cheer.name: Victory Roar
cheer.description: Every click is a win! Hear the crowd go absolutely wild.

electric_current.name: Electric Zzzap
electric_current.description: Feel the shocking power! Each click is an electrifying experience.

explosion.name: Kaboom Click
explosion.description: Boom! Your clicks are absolutely dyn-o-mite. Handle with explosive care.

water_droplet.name: Aqua Drop
water_droplet.description: Drip, drop, clickety-clop! Refreshingly cool sound for every press.

man_laugh.name: Jolly Chuckle
man_laugh.description: Ha! Even your spacebar finds your clicking speed hilariously impressive.

samsung_galaxy_whistle_notification.name: Galaxy Whistle
samsung_galaxy_whistle_notification.description: Notification: You've clicked again! That iconic, catchy whistle sound.

cough.name: Ahem!
cough.description: Ahem! Just clearing its throat... or is your clicking contagious?

default.name: Default Chill
default.description: Like soft teardrops on piano keys, a gentle, reflective melody.

crazy_dave.name: Crazy Dave
crazy_dave.description: Wacky, off-kilter, and memorable. Suggests an eccentric, friendly character.

cool_cat_jazz.name: Cool Cat Jazz
cool_cat_jazz.description: Cool cat jazz! Snappy, upbeat, and swinging. Makes you want to tap your feet!

watery_graves.name: Watery Graves
watery_graves.description: Mellow, flowing, and relaxed. Evokes calm, aquatic serenity.

braniac_maniac.name: Braniac Maniac
braniac_maniac.description: Intense, dramatic, fast-paced track. Signals epic confrontation or climactic moment.

butterfly_lovers_violin_concerto.name: Butterfly Lovers' Violin Concerto
butterfly_lovers_violin_concerto.description: Beloved violin concerto, a poignant and iconic tragic love story from Chinese folklore.

rising_higher_step_by_step.name: Rising Higher Step by Step
rising_higher_step_by_step.description: Upbeat, optimistic climb! Like skipping towards a bright and hopeful future.

dance_of_the_golden_snake.name: Dance of the Golden Snake
dance_of_the_golden_snake.description: Fiery, festive serpent dance! Pure, unadulterated musical fireworks. Wildly jubilant.

horse_racing.name: Horse Racing
horse_racing.description: Vibrant erhu piece depicting thrilling horse race energy and lively festivity.

yankee_doodle.name: Yankee Doodle
yankee_doodle.description: Jaunty, playful fife and drum. A spirited, iconic tune of early Americana.

ode_to_joy.name: Ode to Joy
ode_to_joy.description: Grand, triumphant melody on piano. A powerful, uplifting theme of universal celebration.

flight_of_the_bumblebee.name: Flight of the Bumblebee
flight_of_the_bumblebee.description: Zipping, buzzing whirlwind! Incredible instrumental speed mimics a frantic, furious insect.

the_generals_edict.name: The General's Edict
the_generals_edict.description: Piercing suona, crashing cymbals! A general's urgent command echoes on a dramatic battlefield.
